<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It doesn&#39;t make sense to access one global value using another globals</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// values address, so we can assume that there is no aliasing in case of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
